      • getModificationCount

        public abstract int getModificationCount(VirtualFile fileOrDirectory)
        Returns:
        a number that's incremented every time something changes for the file: name, size, flags, content. This number is persisted between IDE sessions and so it'll always increase. This method invocation means disk access, so it's not terribly cheap.

      • getModificationCount

        public abstract int getModificationCount()
        Returns:
        a number that's incremented every time something changes in the VFS, i.e. file hierarchy, names, flags, attributes, contents. This only counts modifications done in current IDE session.
        See Also:
        getStructureModificationCount(), getFilesystemModificationCount()

      • getStructureModificationCount

        public abstract int getStructureModificationCount()
        Returns:
        a number that's incremented every time something changes in the VFS structure, i.e. file hierarchy or names. This only counts modifications done in current IDE session.
        See Also:
        getModificationCount()

      • getFilesystemModificationCount

        public abstract int getFilesystemModificationCount()
        Returns:
        a number that's incremented every time modification count for some file is advanced, @see getModificationCount(VirtualFile). This number is persisted between IDE sessions and so it'll always increase. This method invocation means disk access, so it's not terribly cheap.
